Item Description:
Finally, the Business Catalyst backup solution that lets you sleep better at night.

BackupBC is the ONLY backup solution built right inside the Business Catalyst admin console. It’s so easy, you’ll be counting sheep in no time.
Author: Karim Ardalan and Joe Wellborn
Summary: We developed the first Backup app for Business Catalyst utilizing the new Open BC platform. The app allows clients and partners to easily make a backup of their BC sites and sleep better at night knowing their data is safely backed up.

Item Description: This custom developed app allows any clients using our IDX Feed App to easily select which listings they would like to feature on their home page.
Author: Karim Ardalan
Summary: This custom developed app allows any clients using our IDX Feed App to easily select which listings they would like to feature on their home page.

Item Description: We developed a Business Catalyst app that automatically downloads the listings from the MLS (IDX) and imports them as Web Apps. This then allows any BC developer to build a real estate website in Business Catalyst.
Author: Karim Ardalan
Summary: We developed a Business Catalyst app that automatically downloads the listings from the MLS (IDX) and imports them as Web Apps. This then allows any BC developer to build a real estate website in Business Catalyst.

Item Description: This custom developed Business Catalyst Admin App allows clients to integrate their electronic downloads with SendOwl. SendOwl is a feature-rich online platform for selling and distributing electronic items that is much easier and includes many more features than the built-in BC electronic downloads.
Author: Karim Ardalan
Summary: This custom developed Business Catalyst Admin App allows clients to integrate their electronic downloads with SendOwl. SendOwl is a feature-rich online platform for selling and distributing electronic items that is much easier and includes many more features than the built-in BC electronic downloads.
